Nemesis Enforcer/Stinkbomb/Oblitercons:

::The Oblitercons get up, after being hit from Tigerhawk's 'powerful' blows::
"That's it, time to dump the chump!" Scavenger yelled.
"Shut up!  I give the orders here!" ::Dark One fires off a volley of 
explosive shells at Liono::
::Nemesis Enforcer fires a missile off at Tigerhawk, leaping in the air and 
stabbing his energon blade at Liono's 'sternum'::

::Hiss fires three fusion blasts off at Liono::

::Pyro fires off five fire balls from his flame cannon at Liono::

::Scavenger yells:: "No one messes with our leader, and lives!" ::Getting to 
one knee and firing a rocket form his missile launcher off at Liono::

::Breakdown sighs:: "Foolish Maximals."
::Firing a grenade off at Liono, raising his other hand to show a laser 
pistol, firing off at shot at Tigerhawk::

---

::Ramhorn slowly got up, not seeing his weapon, pulling out a laser pistol 
and firing off a few pot shots at Nemesis Enforcer::

::Stinkbomb, still holding the rifle, leaped into the air, stabbing his tail 
into the 'wall' of the mountain like terrain, slowly climbing up to try and 
get to the Alliance::
